title: August 1st- Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: August 1st- Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Beyonce's Renaissance Album + Kelis Drama, Unofficial Bridgerton Musical vs. Netflix, Shakira's Having an Off Year, Oscars Drama Continues (Will Smith & Chris Rock Slap), Jojo Siwa vs. Candace Cameron Bure,  + Taylor Swift Drama
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from discussing our thoughts on Beyonce's new album & Kelis drama to Shakira's off year . See below for the topics of the week:


Beyonce's Renaissance Album + Kelis Drama

  • Thoughts on Beyonce's new album
  • Kelis Calls Out Beyoncé for ‘Theft’ Over Using ‘Milkshake,’ But Her Real Beef Lies in Years-Old Feud With Pharrell



Unofficial Bridgerton Musical vs. Netflix

  • Netflix Is Suing The Women Who Created The Grammy-Winning "Unofficial Bridgerton Musical"



Shakira's Having an Off Year

  • Shakira Facing 8 Years In Prison For Tax Evasion



Oscars Drama Continues (Will Smith & Chris Rock Slap)

  • Will Smith addresses Oscars slap in new video



Jojo Siwa vs. Candace Cameron Bure

  • Everything to Know About Candace Cameron Bure and JoJo Siwa's Public Spat



Taylor Swift

  • Taylor Swift Pushes Back Against Her Chart-Topping Private Jet Carbon Emissions





Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
